data.tweet: Mancehster City managed to create chances worth an impressive 2.5 xG, significantly more than the Premier League average of 1.2 xG per game. Crystal Palace only created 0.1 xG, considerably less than their average this season of 1.1 xG.
sentences: Crystal Palace managed to create an impressive 0.1 xG worth of chances.
This season, Crystal Palace have averaged 1.1 expected goals per 90 minutes.
Manchester City managed to create an impressive 2.5 xG worth of chances.
Premier league teams have created an average of 1.2 xG worth of chances per 90 minutes.

data.tweet: Manchester City dominated possession, completing 734 passes - vastly more than the Premier League average of 349 passes.
sentences: Manchester City completed 734 passes.
Premier league teams complete, on average, 349 passes per 90 minutes.

data.tweet: Manchester City completing 15 key passes, while limiting Crystal Palace to two. Key passes are defined as any pass that leads to a teammate's shot.
sentences: Manchester City made 15 key passes.
Crystal Palace completed two key passes.
Premier league teams complete an average of 8.6 key passes per 90 minutes.

data.tweet: Manchester City carried the ball into the Palace penalty area eight times, while Palace only did so once. This season Crystal Palace have averaged 4.6 carries into the opponent's box.
sentences: Crystal Palace carried the ball into the opponent's penalty area one time.
This season, Crystal Palace have averaged 4.6 carried balls into the opponent's box per 90 minutes.
Manchester City carried the ball into the opponent's box eight times.
Premier league teams average 4.1 ball carries into the opponent's box per 90 minutes.

data.tweet: Manchester City succesffuly played an impressive 77 passes into the final third, up massively from 42 in their preivous match (against Newcastle). Crystal Palace only managed 9 passes into the attacking third, while the Premier League average is 27 per 90 minutes.
sentences: Manchester City managed to play an impressive 77 successful balls into the final third.
Crystal Palace managed to play an impressive 9 successful balls into the final third.

data.tweet: Manchester City were adventurous in possession, taking only 14% of their touches in the defensive third. Around 55% of Crystal Palace's touches were in the defensive third, while the average across the division is 33%.
sentences: Manchester City took 14% of the touches they played defensive third.
Crystal Palace took 55% of the touches they played in the defensive third.
Just under 3 in 10 (33%) of Premier League's touches have been taken in the defensive third.
story: Percentage of defensive third touches (league average)

data.tweet: Manchester City carried the ball a combined 1,835 yards towards the opponent's goal. The Premier League average is 858 yards.
